# issue 26880: list with tests has wrong variant in imports
go list -test -f '{{.ImportPath}} {{.Imports}}' a b
stdout 'a \[b\]'
stdout 'b \[\]'
stdout 'b \[b.test\] \[\]'
stdout 'b_test \[b.test\] \[a \[b.test\]\]'

-- a/a.go --
package a; import _ "b"
-- b/b.go --
package b
-- b/b_test.go --
package b
-- b/b_x_test.go --
package b_test; import _ "a"
